name: UpToUs
tag_list: organize, plan, parents, teachers, coaches, family, school, classroom, communicate, collaborate, education, children, sports-teams, activities, youth-athletics, clubs
overview:
UpToUs is a unique social network that brings parents together and helps them to organize their children’s communities, such as classrooms, sports teams and extracurricular activities.

UpToUs makes it safe, easy and engaging for parents to be more involved in their childrenâ€™s lives and to organize all their groups and activities in one place. UpToUs is the solution for scheduling and communication, as well as for sharing and socializing.

UpToUs, created by parents for parents, is filled with tools designed to make life simpler: a centralized calendar for all your child’s activities, parent directory, group e-mail announcements, photo and file sharing, volunteer organizer, potluck planner, discussion groups, homework panel, snack scheduler and much more.

UpToUs is free, easy to use, and safe.
